credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Smith
title: Patchwork cover
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: chromolithography printed on 7 & 1 satin, stitching
description: Patchwork cover made of cigarette souvenir squares printed with different types of flowers as well as two squares containing the mottos: "Always laugh when you can," and "Discontent is the want of self-reliance." Backed with pink cotton fabric.
name: Patchwork cover
